1011111101011010 0010100110000100 1 -> sum: 1110100011011111, cout: 0
0011100001001110 1100010000101101 0 -> sum: 1111110001111011, cout: 0
1011001001001100 1011011110100100 0 -> sum: 0110100111110000, cout: 1
0101001100010101 0101000000111000 1 -> sum: 1010001101001110, cout: 0
0110000000111000 0001000110001001 0 -> sum: 0111000111000001, cout: 0
1101111110001101 0101110011001011 0 -> sum: 0011110001011000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
